knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment=NA)

## GET [/brapi/v1/variables?page={page}&pageSize={pageSize}&traitClass={traitClass}]

```{r}
library(brapi)
library(magrittr)

# make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process
con <- ba_connect()

json <- ba_observationvariables(con, rclass = "json")
```

### Response

Code: 200 (application/json)

```json
`r json`
```
